# 1-sigma errors on the B-mode power spectrum (C_ell^{BB}) for different SO SAT noise configurations, corresponding to the three cases in Fig. 11 of the SO science goals paper
# Errors are given in units of micro-K^2 sterad
# Columns are:
#   1-Multipole ell
#   2-sigma(C_ell), baseline n. lev., pess. 1/f, no beam
#   3-sigma(C_ell), baseline n. lev., opt. 1/f, no beam
#   4-sigma(C_ell), baseline n. lev., opt. 1/f, no beam
#   5-sigma(C_ell), goal n. lev., pess. 1/f, with beam
#   6-sigma(C_ell), goal n. lev., opt. 1/f, with beam
#   7-sigma(C_ell), goal n. lev., opt. 1/f, with beam
#
